title: What is Bake Off stars Henry and Michael’s relationship?
text:
Is romance blossoming between Michael and Henry? (Picture: Channel 4/METRO)

The Great British Bake Off might be over for another year – with David Atherton having been crowned champion – but that doesn’t mean we’ve forgotten about the contestants already.

And two of this year’s participants are keeping the rumour mill churning in the wake of the final, amid suggestions they could be more than just friends.

Yup, following all the speculation over finalist Alice Fevronia and fellow baker Henry Bird this year, Henry’s now been linked to someone else entirely, namely 2019 contestant Michael Chakraverty.

Just what is going on? Here’s what you need to know…

What is Bake Off stars Henry and Michael’s relationship?

OK, so nobody’s actually confirmed that Henry and Michael are dating (any more than they confirmed that Henry and Alice were dating).

However fans of the show have gone wild after Alice shared a photo on her Instagram Stories of Henry and Michael baking brownies together, with the pair looking very cosy indeed.

This picture has sparked a whole lot of speculation (Picture: Instagram)

The image sees Henry standing behind Michael as he mixes chocolate in a bowl, resting his head on Michael’s shoulder as he does so.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Alice captioned the image ‘Swayze eat your heart out (a reference to the infamous pottery scene from Ghost)…BAE-ke Off,’ ending the phrase with a blue heart emoji.

The pair definitely seem pretty close (Picture: Instagram)

It doesn’t end there though, with the teacher dropping further hints that the pair could be more than just friends with another photo last month.

This one featured Henry planting a kiss on Michael’s cheek, with the caption: ‘But how many couples can you see?’

Of course the fans are loving it:

Have Alice and Henry dated?

Once again it was never confirmed that the pair have had a romance, although they definitely appear close, having bonded in the tent and spent time together since the series was filmed.

The pair have been very active on Instagram, with Alice sharing snaps of her and Henry at the Tate Modern after she was named Star Baker in Biscuit Week.

Their fellow bakers were quick to comment on that occasion, with Helena Garcia saying: ‘You two couldn’t possibly be more adorable,’ while Michael called them a ‘beautiful couple’.

However Alice has since denied the claims she and Henry were more than just friends, taking to Instagram to call him her ‘brother from another mother’.

The Great British Bake Off will return in 2020.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: Henry Bird and Michael Chakraverty from The Great British Bake Off have set the rumour mill ablaze - but just what is their relationship?
